title: Amazon’s 2nd Gen Echo Buds are finally available in India
content:
Amazon’s Alexa-powered Echo speakers have become a cultural phenomenon. But not many people know that the company also sells Bluetooth earphones dubbed the Echo Buds. In April last year, Amazon refreshed its earphones lineup with the Echo Buds 2nd Gen, featuring an updated design and ANC support. Initially exclusive to the western markets, the new

The post Amazon’s 2nd Gen Echo Buds are finally available in India appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Amazon has launched the all-new Echo Buds 2nd Gen in India. The earbuds come in two variants and start at ₹11,999. Read on.
